_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL -,, PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Node.js WhatsApp Bot
author: nelpfree1@gmail.com
description: Node.js application with Chromium support for WhatsApp Bot using whatsapp-web.js and Puppeteer

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt-get update
apt-get install -y ca-certificates fonts-liberation libasound2 libatk-bridge2.0-0 libatk1.0-0 libc6 libcairo2 libcups2 libdbus-1-3 libexpat1 libfontconfig1 libgbm1 libgcc1 libglib2.0-0 libgtk-3-0 libnspr4 libnss3 libpango-1.0-0 libpangocairo-1.0-0 libstdc++6 libx11-6 libx11-xcb1 libxcb1 libxcomposite1 libxcursor1 libxdamage1 libxext6 libxfixes3 libxi6 libxrandr2 libxrender1 libxss1 libxtst6 lsb-release wget xdg-utils chromium

if [ -r /etc/debian_version ]; then
    if [ ! -z "${GIT_ADDRESS}" ]; then
        git clone --depth 1 ${GIT_ADDRESS} /mnt/server
    else
        mkdir -p /mnt/server
    fi
fi

variables.name: Git Repo Address
variables.description: GitHub repo to clone (optional). Leave empty to upload files manually via SFTP.

variables.name: App Port
variables.description: Port for the application to listen on
